data.short_description: Left side / right side of the cam freezes in video share
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a video conversation - doubleclick on the picture to get in the 2 video cam at once perspective - get your client into windowed mode - resize your window so it has a square shape or put your window on a 4:3 monitor in fullscreen - watch the your cam / the cam of your friend - if you hover over an icon (start screensharing) the freezed part of the cam updates
